ttp_template:
<group name="index_instance_router_id_address_interface_priority_dr_address_backup_dr_address_state_state_changes_ls_retransmits_ls_requests_db_summaries_adjacency">
 {{INDEX}} instance={{INSTANCE}} router-id={{ROUTER_ID}} address={{ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} interface={{INTERFACE}} priority={{PRIORITY}} dr-address={{DR_ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} backup-dr-address={{BACKUP_DR_ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} state={{STATE | ORPHRASE}} state-changes={{STATE_CHANGES | ORPHRASE}} ls-retransmits={{LS_RETRANSMITS}} ls-requests={{LS_REQUESTS}} db-summaries={{DB_SUMMARIES}} adjacency={{ADJACENCY | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
<group name="index_instance_router_id_address_interface_priority_dr_address_backup_dr_address_state_state_changes_ls_retransmits_ls_requests_db_summaries">
 {{INDEX}} instance={{INSTANCE}} router-id={{ROUTER_ID}} address={{ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} interface={{INTERFACE}} priority={{PRIORITY}} dr-address={{DR_ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} backup-dr-address={{BACKUP_DR_ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} state={{STATE | ORPHRASE}} state-changes={{STATE_CHANGES | ORPHRASE}} ls-retransmits={{LS_RETRANSMITS}} ls-requests={{LS_REQUESTS}} db-summaries={{DB_SUMMARIES}}
</group>

0 instance=default router-id=1.2.3.4 address=1.2.3.58 interface=vlan1 priority=128 dr-address=0.0.0.0 backup-dr-address=0.0.0.0 state=Full state-changes=5 ls-retransmits=0 ls-requests=0 db-summaries=0 adjacency=7w5d8h47m54s
 1 instance=default router-id=1.2.3.5 address=1.2.3.59 interface=vlan2 priority=128 dr-address=0.0.0.0 backup-dr-address=0.0.0.0 state=Full state-changes=5 ls-retransmits=0 ls-requests=0 db-summaries=0
textfsm_template:
Value INDEX (\d+)
Value INSTANCE (\S+)
Value ROUTER_ID (\S+)
Value ADDRESS (\S+)
Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value PRIORITY (\d+)
Value DR_ADDRESS (\S+)
Value BACKUP_DR_ADDRESS (\S+)
Value STATE (\S+)
Value STATE_CHANGES (\d+)
Value LS_RETRANSMITS (\d+)
Value LS_REQUESTS (\d+)
Value DB_SUMMARIES (\d+)
Value ADJACENCY (\S+)

Start
  ^\s*${INDEX}\s+instance=${INSTANCE}\s+router-id=${ROUTER_ID}\s+address=${ADDRESS}\s+interface=${INTERFACE}\s+priority=${PRIORITY}(\s+dr-address=${DR_ADDRESS})?(\s+backup-dr-address=${BACKUP_DR_ADDRESS})?(\s+state=${STATE})?(\s+state-changes=${STATE_CHANGES})?(\s+ls-retransmits=${LS_RETRANSMITS})?(\s+ls-requests=${LS_REQUESTS})?(\s+db-summaries=${DB_SUMMARIES})?(\s+adjacency=${ADJACENCY})?\s*$$ -> Record
  ^\s*$$
  ^. -> Error
